EmailTemplate.description: Dealer Magazine Dec 2010 - Todd Crossley Interview Gives Vin Props
EmailTemplate.name: Dealer Magazine_Crossley&Vin
EmailTemplate.subject: Real Results with VinSolutions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Despite the challenging economy, Gary Crossley Ford in Kansas City, MO implemented a strategy that has increased their revenue and reduced their operating costs thanks, in part, to VinSolutions fully integrated DMS.
Congrats to Todd Crossley and his team on their BEST MONTH EVER!
Click here to read the cover story from Dealer magazine: http://tinyurl.com/CrossleyFeaturesVin
Then call me today to find out more.
